catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Woollen Fedora Hat
catentdesc.longdescription: Suitable for for both men and women, this denim-colored fedora hat is made of light wool and presents a professional style. Donning an iconic style, this fedora has an indented crown with a matching side feather. It can make a fashion statement in the winter.

catentdesc.name: Albini Summer Hat
catentdesc.shortdescription: Brown sun hat with zebra stripes
catentdesc.longdescription: This sun hat sporting a ribbon with zebra stripes comes in an earthy tone. With a wide circular crown, the hat provides adequate protection from the summer sun. Made of 100% straw, this hat is functional as well as fancy.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Wide-Brimmed Gray Hat
catentdesc.shortdescription: Wide-brimmed gray hat with satin headband
catentdesc.longdescription: This stylish and sleek wide-brimmed hat is the epitome of elegance from the very first look. Dressy enough for a formal occasion, wear this hat for a church ceremony or at a wedding reception.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Purple Cloche Hat
catentdesc.shortdescription: Purple cloche hat with headband and bow
catentdesc.longdescription: A trendsetter for spring, this purple cloche is elegant yet fashionable for a fun picnic out in the sun. The white hemming on the band adds a starking contrast to the theme. Match it with your favorite dress for a svelte look.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Raffia Sun Hat
catentdesc.shortdescription: Raffia sun hat with broad cloth headband
catentdesc.longdescription: This raffia sun hat, in dichromatic hues, is your travel companion for those sunny holidays. Resilient to sun and rain, the raffia straw is the raw material used for this hat. Available in different styles and patterns, the raffia hat helps you stay cool in summer.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Classic Black Aviator Sunglasses
catentdesc.longdescription: These classic black aviator sunglasses are known for its large, oval frames and dark gray lenses. Originally created for pilots, they are also known as 'pilot 's glasses '. The most basic of all glasses, these aviators can be worn for any occasion.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Oval Gradient Glasses
catentdesc.shortdescription: Oval gradient glasses with brown plastic frames
catentdesc.longdescription: These oval glasses feature purple gradient lenses on brown plastic frames. They are timeless and have been part of the everlasting fashionable items in the modern world. With a retro look, they are vintage style sunglasses.

catentdesc.name: Albini Rectangle Sunglasses
catentdesc.shortdescription: Rectangle sunglasses with pink patterned frames
catentdesc.longdescription: These rectangle sunglasses with pink patterned frames provide a youthful look. Suited for round faces, these glasses provide 100% UV protection. Wear it for an ultra glamorous appearance.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Large, Square Sunglasses
catentdesc.shortdescription: Large, square sunglasses with frames in dual colors
catentdesc.longdescription: With large, square frames and tinted lenses, these sunglasses appear stylish. Following an 80s slit style, they are classic and designer. Being polarized, these glasses protect you from UV rays and extra glare.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Catty Sunglasses
catentdesc.longdescription: Sporty sunglasses with a metal clasp around the temples, these glasses can present a catty look. In an alternating pattern of orange and black hues, they are functional as well as fashionable.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Black-Rimmed Round Sunglasses
catentdesc.longdescription: These black-rimmed round sunglasses are your vintage oversized glasses with purple gradient lenses. The round frames set the look for the season. In sober black, these glasses can be matched with any outfit.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Chocolate-Colored Leather Belt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Chocolate-colored leather belt with rectangular brass buckle
catentdesc.longdescription: This chocolate-colored leather belt has a rough texture with a rectangular brass pin buckle at the end. The distressed detailing is understated and polished. Choose this belt with your outfit for a rugged yet stylish look.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Brown Leather Belt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Brown leather belt with a patterned finish and shiny buckle
catentdesc.longdescription: This brown leather belt with a patterned finish and a shiny buckle is for everyday wear with your jeans. Western-inspired, this belt feature feathered edges. Soft and durable, this belt can be a wardrobe essential.

catentdesc.name: Albini Brown Slim Leather Belt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Brown slim leather belt with a smooth finish
catentdesc.longdescription: With a smooth texture and finish, this brown slim leather belt is great with your office pants. The downtown chic look displays a professional style. Made of genuine leather, the gilt-edged buckle add a bit of bling.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Black Leather Belt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black leather belt with fancy metal clasp
catentdesc.longdescription: This smooth black leather belt looks swanky with its broad metal engraved buckle. The exquisite modern pattern on the buckle exudes sophistication. From a plain black theme, this belt is now a fashion accessory.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Blue Leather Belt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Blue leather belt with metal buckle
catentdesc.longdescription: Elegant and stylish in navy blue, this belt has a metal buckle and is characterized by horizontal seams across the length of the belt. Nifty with a contrast-colored outfit, wear this belt to bring life into a dull wardrobe.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Textured Brown Belt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Textured brown belt with chrome clasp
catentdesc.longdescription: A unique variation from the plain brown belt, this belt with chrome clasp is for the fashion-conscious. This belt follows a slim style and the scaly pattern lends a designer appearance.
